title: For Sale:             LaRue Tactical 5.56 Stealth Sniper System LT011 20" upper
location: West Boca Raton, Palm Beach, South Florida
postcontent:
Selling in order to pay the rent. Love this upper and don't want to let it go. It's been a safe queen for three years and I need the money.

Just pull the pins on your old upper, swap it with the Stealth, and begin shooting one ragged hole.  Answering the demands of today's precision AR-Shooter, we designed the Stealth Sniper System with ¾" 100-yard shot groups in mind. Exceeding our expectations, the Stealth has earned a great reputation for it's sub-MOA accuracy, with reports of consistent hits on 4" plates out to 400 yards with 77 grain Mk262 ammunition.  Assembled using our CNC-machined Stealth Billet Upper (LT-007) as the backbone, complete Stealth Uppers are available in 12", 16", 18" & 20" barrel-lengths with the LT handguard length of your choice. Complete Stealth Uppers come expertly-assembled and tested with Receiver, Free-float Handguard, Barrel, Low-Profile Gasblock and Tube, Mil-Contract M16 Bolt Carrier Group and Charging Handle. Recommended barrel length / handguard lengths: 20" Barrel: 13.2" & 12.0" Handguards

Upper Receiver: The LaRue Stealth receiver is an improved-version of the currently fielded mil-spec flat-top receiver. Machined from billet 7075-T6, the Stealth is designed with more of material in critical areas to alleviate past issues of weakness and to stiffen the receiver, maximizing the weapons overall accuracy. Barrels: LaRue Stealth Barrels are Stainless Steel, Wylde-chambered in 5.56mm, 1-in-8 twist polygonal rifling in medium-weight contour.  Free-Float Integrated Rail System: CNC-machined out of aluminum, LT handguards are available in 7.0", 9.0", 10.0", 11.0", 12.0", and 13.2" lengths. Our two-pin proprietary barrel nut system with its locking anti-slip plate, sets LaRue handguards apart from the competition. Once the rail is properly installed, there is no chance of movement whatsoever. Everything locks into place rock-solid. This is vital when utilizing lasers, optics and other hardware. The side and bottom rails are tucked closer to the barrel, keeping the profile narrower and more streamlined. Special cuts on each rail's end are designed to work with both mil-issue and standard rail covers. LaRue handguards also include a QD sling-swivel socket integrally-mounted at the base of each side for convenient mounting 2-point slings. Additionally, our Free-float Rail system provides an excellent heat-sinking feature that pulls throat-damaging heat away from the chamber area. Another heat-sinking benefit is the elimination of pressure-spikes, which some feel is the cause of a large part of pre-mature bolt failures. M16 Bolt-Carrier Group: Assembled to TexasSpecTM our Bolt Carrier Groups use the same mil-spec hardware used military-wide. Additionally, LT assembly enhancements greatly minimize bolt-related failures. Mil-spec gas-key contact areas are precision surface-ground flat for zero gas leakage and then max-staked to eliminate all chances of vibration-induced failures.  Assembly and Testing:  Every LT Stealth Sniper System is precision-assembled and as part of the QA procedure, goes through a final 10-round live-fire function test before being tube-packaged.

title: For Sale/Trade:  1938 mosin nagant Vietnam capture papers bring back
postcontent:
You chance to own a price of Vietnam war history!

This is a 1938 Russian Soviet Mosin Nagant bolt action rifle chambered in 7.62x54R. It has had the barrel cut down and the stock cut down to shorten the rifle into a carbine. It has had M1 Garand sights arc welded to the barrel. 

This rifle was captured by Sergeant David Garver of the 46th Special Forces Company. Sgt Garver was active in the Army Rocket Artillery Group and the Joint United States Military Advisary Group.  He was stationed in Tan Sanh Nhut Air base in southern Vietnam from March 8th 1966 through Febuary 22nd 1967. He brought this rifle back with him Febuary 22nd 1967. The executive officer that signed hie war tropghy registration form was Colonel William B. Fancher of the United States Air Force. 

I'm a home based dealer in Louisville ky. I can ship to ffl and take credit cards over the phone. Asking $450 or trade. I like S&W revolvers, WWII pistols with capture papers, or a 1911.

title: For Sale:  Browning BDA .380 - 1979 LNIB
postcontent:
Offered for the discriminating collector or if you would just like to acquire
a perfect condition vintage Browning firearm is a same as New and Unfired
Browning BDA 380. which is chambered in .380acp.  Manufactured in 1979 by
Beretta for Browning Arms Company who imported and sold the pistols within
the U.S.A.

First produced in 1977 and discontinued in 1997. Resurrected I believe
in 2000 and produced possibly through 2009 with most being in a bright
nickel finish. The newest production years is only a guess and based on
the fact I have owned several with two that had serial number date codes
of 2000 and 2009.

This BDA .380's bright blued finish is virtually flawless and looks as
new as the day it was manufactured. Note the Browning "B" Medallion on
the wood grips which was commonly used up through 1985 and then
discontinued and replaced by the well known "Buckmark" logo. The pistol
comes in the original Styrofoam box with factory outer box and has its
original 13 round magazine along with a factory supplied bore brush (Not
seen in photos and located in a cavity on backside of Styrofoam box) as
well as the owners manual.

If you are a collector of Browning firearms and wish to have a pristine
addition to your stable, I believe you would be hard pressed to find a
superior specimen.

Armslist is limited on the number of photos that can be displayed.  I will gladly send additional pics if requested.

Asking $825.00, cash only transaction - NO TRADES AT THIS TIME.

Here is a recent auction sale - http://www.gunauction.com/buy/12247717

Private party sale, no sales tax or transfer fee.

Must be 18, Arizona resident and legally able to possess a firearm.

If listing is still active, there is no reason to waste your time or mine
inquiring if the pistol is still available. Posting will be deleted within
two hours after being sold.

Thank you for looking.

Gilbert Rd at Chandler Heights Rd, 85249

If you are trading down and you want more cash just sell the damn thing and go buy what you want. STOP trying to get new value for some shit you bought and used the hell out of for ten years. The semi auto ban peranoia is over. If you are selling on here at high price because you know that someone that is not should not have a firearm will pay through the nose to get one, YOU are destroying the 2nd for the rest of us. 

Please try to stop selling shit for a premium "new" price. You are wasting people's time and board space. 

Unless you are selling an Arsenal or a Russian preban AK it ain't fuckin worth $900..$700..unless of coarse you can find someone dumb enough to pay that. 
There is not a hi-point on the planet that sells new for over $200 give it up.

Local purchase information:
All federal and state laws apply. Buyer must complete ATF form 4473 and pass a standard background check in person. 6.5% Ohio sales tax will be collected from Ohio buyer. Please be sure the information on your driver's license is correct so that we can accept that for required identification purposes. 3.75% credit card processing fees apply; cash and check price is what is listed.

Out of State purchase information:
We will complete out of state sales by transferring the gun to your local FFL holder who will then complete the paperwork and background check. Shipping is normally $25 for handguns and $35 for long guns, which covers packaging, shipping costs, tracking numbers, and insurance to most of the lower 48 states. Oversize packages may cost more to send. Know your state gun laws before buying as there are no returns on this item. 3.75% credit card processing fees apply, money order/certified check price is what is listed.

Warranty and Return information:
If there is a manufacturing defect, the repair will be handled by the manufacturer's warranty.

Contact us:
Please contact David Greer with Free Republic Firearms at REDACTED or by phone at REDACTED with any questions. We are located in Massillon, Ohio. To get updates of our new arrivals, "like" our Facebook page, and visit www.freerepublicfirearms.com for more information. If you contact us via email, please include your name and phone number to eliminate spammers and to ensure we can contact you. Occasionally we have problems with messages from hidden email addresses that are sent through gun listing/auction sites. Our reply emails are being returned as undeliverable, so if we don't respond to your email, please make sure we have another way to contact you.  We do not hold firearms, magazines, and accessories, because people do not always follow through with the purchase. Items are sold on a first come; first serve basis.

Trades:
We will consider trades from local, in-person buyers, but we cannot give a value on a gun unless we see it in person. Most of our firearms are new, and we are very selective about what used firearms we sell.   Please realize will cannot pay full retail for your firearm. We are a business, and there has to be room for us to make a small amount when we resell the firearm.  Let us know what you have to trade, and we will let you know if it is something we need.  If you are an out of state buyer, we will not consider a trade. 

About us:
Free Republic Firearms is a family owned FFL dealer located in Massillon Ohio. We are dedicated to supplying quality firearms, ammunition, and accessories to responsible gun owners for the purposes of self-defense, recreation, hunting, shooting sports, and collections.

We seek to make products affordable for our customers by stocking products that our customers need, rather than incur the costs of huge inventories, and large payrolls. Unlike large retailers, we keep our costs low by using our suppliers’ inventories to supplement our inventory. We bring additional products into our inventory as our customers need them, and pass on the savings of our low overhead costs to you.

We believe in providing firearms to responsible people who understand the importance of the 2nd Amendment, and the responsibility we have to protect it.  We are not interested in supplying firearms to those in society who do not have the morals, maturity, and character to be responsible gun owners.  It is our right to refuse to sell firearms to any person. We are interested in arming responsible citizens so that they can defend themselves against the criminal element, not arming the criminal element of society.

Extra information:
To all the spammers and criminals that can't legally buy guns, don't contact us asking to meet in a parking lot to complete a cash sale, or to trade a stolen laptop or other electronics for our guns. You shouldn't have guns, and we're definitely not going to help you get one.  To those who are under the legal age to buy firearms or handguns, we understand your desire to have a gun, but we will not break the law to sell you one, so please don't ask. We believe that if an 18 year old is old enough to fight for our country in the armed forces, they should be able to buy a gun. But until a little common sense is used in Washington DC, we cannot sell handguns to anyone under 21, and long guns to anyone under 18.

Canton, North Canton, Navarre, Dalton, Dover, Louisville, New Philadelphia, Strasburg, Alliance, Uniontown, Canal Fulton, Akron, Wooster, Wadsworth, Barberton, Carrollton, Green, Hartville

Local purchase information:
All federal and state laws apply. Buyer must complete ATF form 4473 and pass a standard background check in person. 6.5% Ohio sales tax will be collected from Ohio buyer. Please be sure the information on your driver's license is correct so that we can accept that for required identification purposes. 3.75% credit card processing fees apply; cash and check price is what is listed.

Out of State purchase information:
We will complete out of state sales by transferring the gun to your local FFL holder who will then complete the paperwork and background check. Shipping is normally $25 for handguns and $35 for long guns, which covers packaging, shipping costs, tracking numbers, and insurance to most of the lower 48 states. Oversize packages may cost more to send. Know your state gun laws before buying as there are no returns on this item. 3.75% credit card processing fees apply, money order/certified check price is what is listed.

Warranty and Return information:
If there is a manufacturing defect, the repair will be handled by the manufacturer's warranty.

Contact us:
Please contact David Greer with Free Republic Firearms at REDACTED or by phone at REDACTED with any questions. We are located in Massillon, Ohio. To get updates of our new arrivals, "like" our Facebook page, and visit www.freerepublicfirearms.com for more information. If you contact us via email, please include your name and phone number to eliminate spammers and to ensure we can contact you. Occasionally we have problems with messages from hidden email addresses that are sent through gun listing/auction sites. Our reply emails are being returned as undeliverable, so if we don't respond to your email, please make sure we have another way to contact you.  We do not hold firearms, magazines, and accessories, because people do not always follow through with the purchase. Items are sold on a first come; first serve basis.

Trades:
We will consider trades from local, in-person buyers, but we cannot give a value on a gun unless we see it in person. Most of our firearms are new, and we are very selective about what used firearms we sell.   Please realize will cannot pay full retail for your firearm. We are a business, and there has to be room for us to make a small amount when we resell the firearm.  Let us know what you have to trade, and we will let you know if it is something we need.  If you are an out of state buyer, we will not consider a trade. 

About us:
Free Republic Firearms is a family owned FFL dealer located in Massillon Ohio. We are dedicated to supplying quality firearms, ammunition, and accessories to responsible gun owners for the purposes of self-defense, recreation, hunting, shooting sports, and collections.

We seek to make products affordable for our customers by stocking products that our customers need, rather than incur the costs of huge inventories, and large payrolls. Unlike large retailers, we keep our costs low by using our suppliers’ inventories to supplement our inventory. We bring additional products into our inventory as our customers need them, and pass on the savings of our low overhead costs to you.

We believe in providing firearms to responsible people who understand the importance of the 2nd Amendment, and the responsibility we have to protect it.  We are not interested in supplying firearms to those in society who do not have the morals, maturity, and character to be responsible gun owners.  It is our right to refuse to sell firearms to any person. We are interested in arming responsible citizens so that they can defend themselves against the criminal element, not arming the criminal element of society.

Extra information:
To all the spammers and criminals that can't legally buy guns, don't contact us asking to meet in a parking lot to complete a cash sale, or to trade a stolen laptop or other electronics for our guns. You shouldn't have guns, and we're definitely not going to help you get one.  To those who are under the legal age to buy firearms or handguns, we understand your desire to have a gun, but we will not break the law to sell you one, so please don't ask. We believe that if an 18 year old is old enough to fight for our country in the armed forces, they should be able to buy a gun. But until a little common sense is used in Washington DC, we cannot sell handguns to anyone under 21, and long guns to anyone under 18.

Local purchase information:
All federal and state laws apply. Buyer must complete ATF form 4473 and pass a standard background check in person. 6.5% Ohio sales tax will be collected from Ohio buyer. Please be sure the information on your driver's license is correct so that we can accept that for required identification purposes. 3.75% credit card processing fees apply; cash and check price is what is listed.

Out of State purchase information:
We will complete out of state sales by transferring the gun to your local FFL holder who will then complete the paperwork and background check. Shipping is normally $25 for handguns and $35 for long guns, which covers packaging, shipping costs, tracking numbers, and insurance to most of the lower 48 states. Oversize packages may cost more to send. Know your state gun laws before buying as there are no returns on this item. 3.75% credit card processing fees apply, money order/certified check price is what is listed.

Warranty and Return information:
If there is a manufacturing defect, the repair will be handled by the manufacturer's warranty.

Contact us:
Please contact David Greer with Free Republic Firearms at REDACTED or by phone at REDACTED with any questions. We are located in Massillon, Ohio. To get updates of our new arrivals, "like" our Facebook page, and visit www.freerepublicfirearms.com for more information. If you contact us via email, please include your name and phone number to eliminate spammers and to ensure we can contact you. Occasionally we have problems with messages from hidden email addresses that are sent through gun listing/auction sites. Our reply emails are being returned as undeliverable, so if we don't respond to your email, please make sure we have another way to contact you.  We do not hold firearms, magazines, and accessories, because people do not always follow through with the purchase. Items are sold on a first come; first serve basis.

Trades:
We will consider trades from local, in-person buyers, but we cannot give a value on a gun unless we see it in person. Most of our firearms are new, and we are very selective about what used firearms we sell.   Please realize will cannot pay full retail for your firearm. We are a business, and there has to be room for us to make a small amount when we resell the firearm.  Let us know what you have to trade, and we will let you know if it is something we need.  If you are an out of state buyer, we will not consider a trade. 

About us:
Free Republic Firearms is a family owned FFL dealer located in Massillon Ohio. We are dedicated to supplying quality firearms, ammunition, and accessories to responsible gun owners for the purposes of self-defense, recreation, hunting, shooting sports, and collections.

We seek to make products affordable for our customers by stocking products that our customers need, rather than incur the costs of huge inventories, and large payrolls. Unlike large retailers, we keep our costs low by using our suppliers’ inventories to supplement our inventory. We bring additional products into our inventory as our customers need them, and pass on the savings of our low overhead costs to you.

We believe in providing firearms to responsible people who understand the importance of the 2nd Amendment, and the responsibility we have to protect it.  We are not interested in supplying firearms to those in society who do not have the morals, maturity, and character to be responsible gun owners.  It is our right to refuse to sell firearms to any person. We are interested in arming responsible citizens so that they can defend themselves against the criminal element, not arming the criminal element of society.

Extra information:
To all the spammers and criminals that can't legally buy guns, don't contact us asking to meet in a parking lot to complete a cash sale, or to trade a stolen laptop or other electronics for our guns. You shouldn't have guns, and we're definitely not going to help you get one.  To those who are under the legal age to buy firearms or handguns, we understand your desire to have a gun, but we will not break the law to sell you one, so please don't ask. We believe that if an 18 year old is old enough to fight for our country in the armed forces, they should be able to buy a gun. But until a little common sense is used in Washington DC, we cannot sell handguns to anyone under 21, and long guns to anyone under 18.

title: For Trade:  FRANCHI SPAS 12 (Semi Auto Shotgun)
postcontent:
This is a pre-ban Franchi import with the original hook stock. The SPAS-12 is a combat shotgun that was manufactured by the Italian firearms company Franchi from 1979 to 2000. The SPAS-12 is a dual-mode shotgun, meaning it can be calibrated to cycle either semi-automatically or through pump-action. The SPAS 12 was designed to function primarily as a semi-automatic firearm, with the pump-action mode used to reliably fire low-pressure ammunition such as tear gas rounds or less-lethal bean bags. Switching between firing modes is done by pressing a button under the foregrip, and sliding the foregrip slightly forward. This is one has a 1987 date code. These guns are pretty rare and hard to find, only 1,850 were imported. 

I have placed Talon grips on the fore grip to help when in pump mode, it can easily be removed.

title: For Sale:  Your Design or Mine Custom Cerakote Lexington
postcontent:
We specialize in taking your thoughts on what you want your gun to look like and making it happen. 

I painted high end cars at a very high end body shop for 10 years before I got into cerakoting firearms. Cars are much easier. Many people think you can buy a 30 dollar paint gun and sand the gun and paint it. Not even close. Cerakote takes very specialized equipment to get that one of a kind finish it provides. Ive spent thousands upon thousands on the newest and best equipment on the market. 

Cerakote, when provided properly, provides an almost indestructible finish while maintaining  a beautiful finish in which there are over 150 colors to choose from. 

I can do any type of pattern such as skulls, snakeskin, carbon fiber and even your own custom logo or pattern. If you can dream it we can achieve it. 

Im not trying to get rich off this. It is more of a passion for me than a job. Once it becomes a job its no fun. So I offer the most competitive prices around and guarantee satisfaction. Email or text me day or night for a  price quote. Be detailed in the descriptions of what color or colors you want and if you want patterns. If you are not sure I will be glad to help you work your way through that process. 
REDACTED
REDACTED
DAY OR NIGHT

title: For Trade:  Trading my tac shotgun and rifles for handguns
postcontent:
Here I have a few option for trade for nicer handguns.  Im not too hung up on matching values if you have something lower end like taurus but dont bother offering high points or keltecs unless you're adding cash.  Also keep in mind you will need to come to lakeland as my truck costs far too much to drive any real distance.  That being said, I am very open to trades and I never flake so feel free to offer.  

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Yugo type M59/66 Millitary variant SKS in Tapco furniture with all original furniture included (no box mag), as well as a 40 round promag and 20 round tapco mag. This rifle IS section922r compliant and needs no further modification. The SKS is the AK's daddy, and with the longer heavier barrel is even more accurate over further distances. Breakdown is simple and well maintained this rifle will long outlive you. Chanbered in 7.62x39 it is not only a threat stopper, as well as a hunter, but is cheap to shoot. Throw on a muzzle brake and a bumpfire stock, and this rifle will fire at full auto speeds without issue.  Thie yugo's are by far considered to be the most robust of the sks variants, and are the only ones that come stock with a threaded barrel, and gas system shut off valve.  After-market parts are absolutely plentiful and will allow you to build this rifle to suit ANY purpose (you can even get a bullpup stock for it!).  I could go on forever about how great the rifle is, but see it for yourself.  
-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Mossberg 500 Tactical persuader pump, 8 shot capacity with the 20" smooth bore barrel perfect for self defense. This shotgun cycles perfectly and smoothly, and features an ATI tactical adjustable folding stock with a 5 round shot shell holder and recoil absorbing pad/pistol grip; also the ATI tri rail forend for lights and accessories. Included is a 110 lumen light laser combo. Will also include the cheek rest if you'd rather have that instead of the shot shell holder. Will include about $70 0f various ammo.  This model mossberg is not a standard 500 (it is $500 bare bones) and with all of the additions, is well worth a nice pistol **** SHOTGUN IS SOLD****
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Also up for grabs is a ruger mark 2 22lr bolt action with a 10 round magazine.. functions flawlessly and will include 500 rounds of round nose ammo (older boxes).  To bump the value of the rifle I will also include the rossi 22lr revolver depending on the offer.  The revolver has slight finish wear in two spots but functions wonderfully

----- TRADE PENDING ON THE YUGO----- However feel free to send offers, just in case.  More often than not people flake on here.  

http://www.atigunstocks.com/mossberg-tactical-stocks/281-tactical-shotgun-stock-and-forend-with-scorpion-recoil-system.html

Features:

Each Ruger American Rimfire™ rifle includes two interchangeable stock modules that provide comb height options for scope or iron sight use. Standard models come with long length of pull modules, while compact models come with short length of pull modules. By simply removing the rear sling swivel stud, stock modules can be changed in minutes.

Models chambered in .22 LR feature the detachable, flush-mounted 10/22® BX-1 10-round rotary magazine. Accepts all 10/22® magazines, including the BX-25® and BX-25®x2.

Patent-pending Power Bedding® integral bedding block system positively locates the receiver and free-floats the barrel for outstanding accuracy.

Ruger Marksman Adjustable™ trigger offers a crisp release with a pull weight that is user adjustable between 3 and 5 pounds.

Ergonomic, lightweight black composite stock (designed for quick, easy handling) blends a classic look with modern forend contouring and grip serrations.

Features a visible, accessible and easy-to-actuate tang safety.

Satin blued, target-crowned, hammer-forged barrel results in ultra-precise rifling that provides exceptional accuracy, longevity and easy cleaning.
A 3/8" rimfire scope base is machined into the receiver, which is also drilled and tapped for Weaver® #12 bases (not included).

A 60˚ bolt provides ample scope clearance, while an easy-to-use, receiver-mounted bolt release allows the bolt to be readily removed without requiring a pull of the trigger, a unique safety feature among rimfire, bolt-action rifles.
Also Includes: Williams™ fiber optic front sight and 10/22®-style adjustable, "V" slot, folding-leaf rear sight; sling swivel studs.
